name: Sarah Chen
commit_pattern: Makes frequent, small commits with detailed documentation and comprehensive tests
ai_summary: Sarah is a machine learning engineer with deep expertise in building production ML systems. Her work shows strong focus on code quality, extensive testing, and clear documentation. She excels at bridging the gap between research and production deployment.
best_for: Architecting ML pipelines and model serving infrastructure

name: Alex Rodriguez
commit_pattern: Commits frequently with visual examples and interactive demos in commit messages
ai_summary: Alex specializes in building scalable frontend architectures and design systems. Known for pixel-perfect implementations and strong accessibility practices. Creates highly reusable component libraries with excellent developer experience.

name: Jordan Kim
commit_pattern: Well-structured commits that often include both frontend and backend changes with integration tests
ai_summary: Jordan is a full-stack engineer with expertise in building scalable distributed systems. Strong focus on system design, database optimization, and clean API design. Known for writing maintainable code and comprehensive documentation.

name: Priya Sharma
commit_pattern: Detailed commits with security considerations, threat models, and mitigation strategies documented
ai_summary: Priya is a security engineer focused on building secure authentication systems and infrastructure. Expertise in implementing zero-trust architectures and secure coding practices. Strong background in cryptography and threat modeling.
best_for: Security architecture review and threat modeling

name: Marcus Johnson
commit_pattern: Systematic commits improving infrastructure reliability with detailed runbooks and automation scripts
ai_summary: Marcus specializes in DevOps and infrastructure automation. Expert at building robust CI/CD pipelines and maintaining highly available systems. Strong focus on observability, monitoring, and incident response automation.
best_for: Setting up CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation

name: Emma Watson
commit_pattern: Commits often include Jupyter notebooks with clear explanations, visualizations, and statistical analysis
ai_summary: Emma is a data scientist who excels at turning complex data into actionable insights. Strong background in statistical analysis and building data pipelines. Known for creating clear visualizations and comprehensive documentation of analytical approaches.
best_for: Exploratory data analysis and statistical modeling
